library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
source("chart_functions.R")

pillars_conn <- connect_to_db("rjs_pillars")
df <- dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM report_timespent_ficard_gang_stop") 

df<-df%>%
  mutate(stop_result_simple_re=ifelse(stop_result_simple=="Custodial Arrest without warrant", "Arrest without warrant",
                                      ifelse(stop_result_simple=="Warning (verbal or written)","Warning",ifelse(stop_result_simple=="Custodial Arrest pursuant to outstanding warrant","Arrest with warrant",ifelse(stop_result_simple=="Field interview card completed","Field interview card",stop_result_simple)))))

# custom item coloring
group_colors_item <- c("#D6D6D6", "#211447", meteorite,"#FFD28F", "#BABABA","#8E7ACA", "#BDAFE9", "#FFE680",  "#F0FF85")

# add mwethodnote 
methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated stops made by officers assigned to gang enforcement. Officers assigned to gang enforcement spent a total of 10,975.6 hours on officer-initiated stops in 2022."

# create caption 
caption_text <- paste("<br><br>", sourcenote, methodnote)


chart <- fx_itemchart(
    df=df, 
    x="stop_result_simple_re",
    y="duration_rate", 
    group_colors=group_colors_item,
    # row_nums=5, # integer
    top_finding="Officers assigned to gang enforcement spend nearly 1 in 5 patrol hours on stops resulting in a field interview card",
    subtitle= "Percent of hours officers assigned to gang enforcement spend on stops by stop result",
    tooltip_text="Out of 100 hours, SDPD officers assigned to gang enforcement spent <br><b>{point.duration_rate:.1f}</b> hours on stops that resulted in <b>{point.stop_result_simple}</b>.",
    legend_text="Single dot represents 1 hour out of 100 hours",
    caption = caption_text)    

# Trying to customize the order of the item chart ----------

df$stop_result_simple_re <- factor(df$stop_result_simple_re, levels = c("Field interview card completed",
      "Warning (verbal or written)",
      "No Action",
      "Custodial Arrest without warrant",
      "Psychiatric hold",
      "Custodial Arrest pursuant to outstanding warrant",
      "Citation for infraction",
      "Two or More Results",
      "In-field cite and release"))


dbDisconnect(pillars_conn)
